sentence: Schools and education authoritiesSchools and education authorities Student loans helped young people to pursue their dreams BOC Sichuan Branch launches the Alipay-Life e-CNY online tuition and fee payment scenario at Xihua University BOC Suzhou Branch and Suzhou Institute of Industrial Technology co-launch the first e-CNY campus card hardware wallet for universities in China BOC undertakes national student loans In 2022, while implementing the policy for interest exemption and deferred repayment of national student loans, BOC took into account the migration of graduates and other changes to launch the BOC Student Loan Assistant applet, which allowed students to conveniently apply for deferred repayment of their national student loans over their mobile phone.
